languages.text: {n}Камень душ ярко вспыхивает на груди Ирлиэт, и руки предательски дрожат на рукояти винтовки.{/n} "Твоя смерть не дарует мне радости, архонт Иремерисс. Но, быть может, она дарует покой душам моих собратьев".

{n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."
languages.original_text: {n}Камень душ ярко вспыхивает на груди Ирлиэт, и руки предательски дрожат на рукояти винтовки.{/n} "Твоя смерть не дарует мне радости, архонт Иремерисс. Но, быть может, она дарует покой душам моих собратьев".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's Spirit Stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

languages.text: {n}La pierre-esprit d'Yrliet scintille sur sa poitrine et les mains de la ranger tremblent sur la crosse de son fusil.{/n} « Votre mort ne m'apportera aucune consolation, archonte Yremeryss. Mais elle apportera peut-être le repos aux esprits des miens. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

traits.locale_text: {n}La pierre-esprit d'Yrliet scintille sur sa poitrine et les mains de la ranger tremblent sur la crosse de son fusil.{/n} « Votre mort ne m'apportera aucune consolation, archonte Yremeryss. Mais elle apportera peut-être le repos aux esprits des miens. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特胸前的灵魂石不断闪烁，她握着步枪的双手颤抖着。{/n}“你的死不会给我带来任何快乐，伊芮梅莉斯执政官，但可以为我同胞的灵魂带来安宁。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特胸前的灵魂石不断闪烁，她握着步枪的双手颤抖着。{/n}“你的死不会给我带来任何快乐，伊芮梅莉斯执政官，但可以为我同胞的灵魂带来安宁。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの魂縛石が胸元で閃光を放つと、レンジャーのライフルを握る手が震えた。{/n}「アーコン・イレメリス、貴様が死んだところで何の感慨もないだろう。だが、我が血族の魂には安らぎを与えられるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの魂縛石が胸元で閃光を放つと、レンジャーのライフルを握る手が震えた。{/n}「アーコン・イレメリス、貴様が死んだところで何の感慨もないだろう。だが、我が血族の魂には安らぎを与えられるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust funkelt und mit zittrigen Händen hält die Weltenläuferin ihr Gewehr fest.{/n} "Euer Tod wird mir keinerlei Freude bereiten, Archontin Yremeryss. Aber er wird den Seelen meines Volkes Frieden schenken."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust funkelt und mit zittrigen Händen hält die Weltenläuferin ihr Gewehr fest.{/n} "Euer Tod wird mir keinerlei Freude bereiten, Archontin Yremeryss. Aber er wird den Seelen meines Volkes Frieden schenken."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La joya espiritual de Yrliet centellea en su pecho, y las manos de la exploradora empuñan temblorosamente su fusil.{/n} «Tu muerte no me proporcionará dicha, arconte Yremeryss. Pero tal vez conceda paz a los espíritus de mis hermanos».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

traits.locale_text: {n}La joya espiritual de Yrliet centellea en su pecho, y las manos de la exploradora empuñan temblorosamente su fusil.{/n} «Tu muerte no me proporcionará dicha, arconte Yremeryss. Pero tal vez conceda paz a los espíritus de mis hermanos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in göğsündeki ruh taşı parlıyor ve Korucu'nun silahını tutmakta olan elleri titreme başlıyor.{/n} "Ölümün bana mutluluk getirmeyecek Arkon Yremeryss ancak belki soydaşlarımın ruhlarını huzura kavuşturabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's spirit stone flashes on her chest and the Ranger's hands tremble on the grip of her rifle.{/n} "Your death will give me no joy, Archon Yremeryss. But it may give peace to the spirits of my kin."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
